verses.roman:
sabāra sahita ihāṅ āmāra ha-ila milana
e varṣa 'nīlādri' keha nā kariha gamana

synonyms: sabāra sahita—with everyone; ihāṅ—here; āmāra—of Me; ha-ila—there was; milana—meeting; e varṣa—this year; nīlādri—to Jagannātha Purī; keha—any of you; nā—not; kariha gamana—go.
translation: Because He had met them all at Śāntipura, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu requested all the devotees not to go to Jagannātha Purī that year.
